rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample natural light and Vastu-optimized positioning for energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area designed for social gatherings and family time. Incorporates Vastu principles with east-facing windows for positivity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; designed for dining and light meals. Features south-east facing openings for harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient workspace with a modern layout and adherence to Vastu guidelines ensuring proper ventilation and light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well ventilated and hygienic space, oriented in accordance with local building norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with a spacious balcony. North-facing to ensure calmness and balance as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large entrance door for ease of access, following local norms and Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony Access to Guest Bedroom
openings.description: Spacious balcony providing natural ventilation and an outdoor view.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large window designed for maximum light as per Vastu recommendations.

openings.name: Poolside Entrance
openings.description: Separate entry to the swimming pool area ensuring privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with a spacious balcony for relaxation. North-east facing to enhance prosperity and health as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom equipped with a large balcony ensuring ample natural light and fresh air.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space designed for productivity, positioned in the west wing to minimize distractions.

rooms.name: Study/Reading Room
rooms.description: A quiet area for study or reading with appropriate lighting and Vastu positioning.

openings.name: Balcony Access to Master Bedroom
openings.description: Spacious balcony ensuring privacy and natural ventilation in line with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Balcony Access to Second Bedroom
